abstract: The alphabet flashcards are the first new work by Dr. Seuss to be published since 1990.
snippet: The alphabet flashcards are the first new work by Dr. Seuss to be published since 1990.
lead_paragraph: Next week, for the first time since 1990, readers will get a fresh dash of whimsy from Theodor Seuss Geisel, better known as Dr. Seuss, with the publication of a long-lost manuscript, “What Pet Should I Get?”

headline.main: New Dr. Seuss Drawings Emerge Before Book’s Publication
